item.title: U.S. Department of Justice: Takes Seriously Criminal Investigation Referral Related to Federal Reserve Board Member Powell
item.description: On August 20th, a U.S. Department of Justice official declared that the department had received a criminal investigation referral concerning Federal Reserve Board Governor Cook and was treating it with great seriousness. (IG)This evening, Trump took to Truth Social and stated, "Federal Reserve Board Governor Cook must resign immediately!!!" Trump's staunch ally, Federal Housing Finance Agency Director Bill Pulte, sent a letter to Department of Justice officials, suggesting that Federal Reserve Board Governor Cook might have committed criminal acts. According to a copy of the letter disclosed by Bloomberg, the letter alleges that Cook "falsified bank documents and asset records in order to obtain more favorable loan terms, potentially violating criminal laws constituting mortgage fraud."

item.title: Block Earner has announced the completion of an $8 million funding round to develop a Bitcoin-backed mortgage product
item.description: On August 20th, the Australian fintech company Block Earner announced the accomplishment of an $8 million financing round for the development of a Bitcoin-backed home loan product. This enables users to utilize Bitcoin as collateral to obtain funds for home purchase or renovation.Block Earner declared that the volatility of the cryptocurrency market is gradually becoming stable. Pilot projects are currently in progress, and it is anticipated that users will successfully use cryptocurrency as collateral to purchase homes within this year.

item.title: A whale withdrew 2,200 ETH from Binance, worth $9.15 million
item.description: On August 20th, as monitored by OnchainLens, a whale transferred 2,200 ETH from Binance. The value of this withdrawal was $9.15 million, and it was sent to Aave V3 for lending.

item.title: LM Funding America has completed a $23 million financing round to increase its Bitcoin holdings.
item.description: On August 20th, LM Funding America, Inc. (Nasdaq: LMFA), which focuses on Bitcoin asset management and mining, announced the successful completion of a $12.6 million registered offering and a $10.4 million private placement, raising a total of approximately $23 million. The net proceeds from this offering will primarily be allocated to purchasing a greater amount of Bitcoin for the company's asset management division.

item.title: U.S. Stock Market Hours: Cryptocurrency Stocks Experience Widespread Decline, ETHZilla Plunges 14%
item.description: On August 20th, based on market data, the U.S. stock market witnessed an expanded decline during intraday trading. The S&P 500 index dropped by 0.6%, and the Nasdaq saw an extended decline of 1.3%. U.S. stock cryptocurrency shares generally turned downward, including:- Circle (CRCL) with a decline of 4.2%;- Coinbase (COIN) down by 3.2%;- MicroStrategy (MSTR) falling by 2.8%;- SharpLink Gaming (SBET) with a decrease of 0.1%;- Bitmine Immersion (BMNR) down by 1.6%;- CEA Industries (BNC) dropping by 7.8%;- ETHZilla (formerly 180 Life Sciences) plunging by 14%.

item.title: Bitcoin Drops Below $113,000, 24-hour Decrease of 1.86%
item.description: On August 20th, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin fell below $113,000, with a 24-hour decline of 1.86%.

item.title: A certain new wallet withdrew 1.35 million ONDO and 1.6 million ENA from Binance.
item.description: August 20th. Based on LookOnChain's monitoring, a newly established wallet withdrew 1.35 million ONDO from Binance within the past hour. The value of this withdrawal was $1.26 million. Additionally, the wallet withdrew 1.6 million ENA, with a value of $1.03 million.

item.title: Kraken Acquires No-Code Trading Company Capitalise.ai
item.description: On August 20th, as per CoinDesk, the cryptocurrency exchange Kraken has made an acquisition of the no-code trading company Capitalise.ai in order to expand its professional platform. Capitalise.ai is an Israel-based enterprise that focuses on no-code and natural language-based trading automation. The financial details of this transaction have not been made public.This acquisition will enable Kraken Pro users to create, backtest, and automatically execute trading strategies by using everyday language without the need to write code. Kraken intends to launch these new features on the Pro platform later this year.

item.title: US Stock Market Opening: Cryptocurrency Stocks Show Mixed Performance, SharpLink Gaming Up by 0.88%
item.description: On August 20th, based on market data, the three major U.S. stock indexes opened in a mixed manner. The Dow Jones Index increased by 0.13%, the S&P 500 Index decreased by 0.08%, and the Nasdaq Composite Index decreased by 0.28%. The stock prices of U.S. crypto companies showed differences. Most Ethereum Treasury companies were trading in an upward trend, including:Circle (CRCL) decreased by 0.27%;Coinbase (COIN) decreased by 0.02%;MicroStrategy (MSTR) decreased by 0.04%;SharpLink Gaming (SBET) increased by 1.2%;Bitmine Immersion (BMNR) increased by 0.88%;BTCS Inc (BTCS) increased by 1.04%.

item.title: Tom Lee: Once interest rates reflect the Fed's dovish stance, the market will end the year strong in 2025
item.description: On August 20th, Tom Lee, the newly appointed Chairman of the Board of BitMine, released the latest market outlook report. He stated, "As we enter the final third of 2025, the most significant change is the Fed's transformation towards dovishness. The ISM index is expected to rebound above 50, laying the groundwork for a strong year-end in the market of 2025. The S&P 500 index has already increased by 9% year-to-date, which is an astonishing performance in any year. Looking ahead to the last few months of 2025, it is anticipated that the market will generally continue to maintain a strong momentum.""In fact, 2025 can be divided into three phases: the first phase is tariff concerns from January to April; the second phase is a V-shaped rebound from April until now; and the third phase is a dovish Fed combined with the recovery of the ISM. Tom Lee believes that the S&P 500 index will reach 6800-7000 points by the end of the year. However, this will not be a linear path. Once interest rat
